content.p: The Knowledge Without Borders Network (KWBN) is a unique collaboration between academics, managers and professional support staff who share an interest in transnational higher education and the internationalisation of universities. It is a focal point for our combined expertise connecting and promoting our existing institutional knowledge and providing a forum for reflection upon ‘The Nottingham Experience’. We engage the international community of researchers and practitioners concerned with: KWBN is based in the Faculty of Arts and Social Sciences at The University of Nottingham Malaysia Campus, a recognition of Malaysia’s ambition to become an international higher education hub. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8040 email: kwbn@nottingham.edu.my
